decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | The east elevation wall shall be painted in the colour specified in the application within three months of the date of this decision. When the painting is complete, notice shall be served on the Local Planning Authority to that effect and arrangements made for the Authority to inspect the work.  REASON:   To protect the appearance of the area, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policy H8, Replacement UDP Policy 5.9.
description: Retention of ground floor rear extension with rendering and painting of the east wall (Colour sample provided)
